info.title: Exelk Inventory Management API
info.description: API documentation for Exelk Inventory Management System

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token

Set-Cookie.description: Sets httpOnly cookies for accessToken and refreshToken

post.description: Logout the user by clearing authentication cookies

get.description: Retrieve information about the currently authenticated user

401.description: Unauthorized - Access token not found or invalid

post.description: Generate a new access token using the refresh token

Set-Cookie.description: Sets new httpOnly access token cookie

401.description: Unauthorized - Refresh token not found or invalid

get.description: Retrieve all brands with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

post.description: Create a new brand in the system

put.description: Update an existing brand in the system

delete.description: Soft delete a brand from the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing brand ID or brand in use

get.description: Retrieve all categories with pagination, sorting, and search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for category name, description, or main category

post.description: Create a new category in the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing required fields or invalid main category

put.description: Update an existing category in the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing category ID or invalid main category

delete.description: Delete a category from the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing category ID or category has child categories

get.description: Retrieve all employees from the system

post.description: Create a new employee in the system

CreatedBy.description: ID of the employee who created this record

error.example: Missing required fields: Email, UserName, Password, RoleID

put.description: Update an existing employee in the system

delete.description: Delete an employee from the system

get.description: Retrieve all models with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for model name or description

post.description: Create a new model in the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing required fields or invalid brand ID

409.description: Model name already exists for this brand

put.description: Update an existing model in the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing model ID or invalid brand ID

409.description: Model name already exists for this brand

delete.description: Delete a model from the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing model ID or model in use by products

post.description: Create a product with version, variation, and specifications in a single transaction

400.description: Bad request - Missing or invalid data

get.description: Retrieve all products with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for product name, description, or SKU

post.description: Create a new basic product in the system

put.description: Update an existing product in the system

delete.description: Delete a product and all related data (versions, variations, specs) from the system

200.description: Product and all related data deleted successfully

get.description: Retrieve all product variations with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for variation name, barcode, color, or size

post.description: Create a new product variation in the system

409.description: Product variation or barcode already exists

put.description: Update an existing product variation in the system

delete.description: Delete a product variation from the system

get.description: Retrieve all product versions with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

post.description: Create a new product version in the system

409.description: Version number already exists for this product

put.description: Update an existing product version in the system

409.description: Version number already exists for this product

delete.description: Delete a product version from the system

get.description: Retrieve all roles from the system
Retrieve all specifications with pagination, sorting, and search

post.description: Create a new specification in the system

put.description: Update an existing specification in the system

delete.description: Soft delete a specification from the system

get.description: Retrieve all specification details with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

post.description: Create a new specification detail in the system

409.description: Specification detail with this variation and spec already exists

put.description: Update an existing specification detail in the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing specification detail ID

409.description: Specification detail with this variation and spec already exists

delete.description: Soft delete a specification detail from the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing specification detail ID

get.description: Retrieve all suppliers with pagination, sorting, search, and filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for supplier name, contact person, or email

post.description: Create a new supplier in the system

409.description: Supplier with this email already exists

put.description: Update an existing supplier in the system

409.description: Supplier with this email already exists

delete.description: Soft delete a supplier from the system

400.description: Bad request - Missing supplier ID or supplier in use by products
